description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The History of the Great Indian War of 1675 and 1676, commonly called Philip's War. Also, the old French and Indian wars from 1689 to 1704 ... With numerous notes an an appendix, by Samuel G. Drake. Revised edition. [With plates.]" Author: CHURCH, Thomas - of Massachusetts Contributor: DRAKE, Samuel Gardner. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9602.d.10." Page: 137 Place of Publishing: Hartford Date of Publishing: 1845 Publisher: S. Andrus & Son Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000700693 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
